title: Django Tutorial Part 10: Testing a Django web application
summary: Writing test code is neither fun nor glamorous, and is consequently often left to last (or not at all) when creating a website. It is however an essential part of making sure that your code is safe to release after making changes, and cost-effective to maintain.
short_title: Django Tutorial Part 10: Testing a Django web application
